channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Usuper (Neutral Social)
channel.description: > ## [color=gray]The Usurper[/color] > [color=gray]**Neutral Social**[/color] **Forged Bloodlines (Passive)** - Your forged documents allow you to put your name forward for nominations to become the next King as if you had Royal Blood. **Backroom Dealings (Day)** - Hide your whispers from the public to and from a specific target. - Infinite uses **Eliminating the Competition (Night)** - Check if a player has royal blood. If they do, you will take it from them (They will know it has been stolen). - Infinite uses **Intimidation (Night)** - Tomorrow, the target will be forced to vote for you to be King, if given the chance to do so. They won't know that you have forced them until after the vote. - 2 uses _Be crowned King, and survive._ ###### ps rip Aftermath

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Usuper (Neutral Social)
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
The Usurper

Neutral Social
Forged Bloodlines (Passive) - Your forged documents allow you to put your name forward for nominations to become the next King as if you had Royal Blood.
Backroom Dealings (Day) - Hide your whispers from the public to and from a specific target. - Infinite uses
Eliminating the Competition (Night) - Check if a player has royal blood. If they do, you will take it from them (They will know it has been stolen). - Infinite uses
Intimidation (Night) - Tomorrow, the target will be forced to vote for you to be King, if given the chance to do so. They won’t know that you have forced them until after the vote. - 2 uses
Be crowned King, and survive.

ps rip Aftermath

Read full topic
